ygData.subject: Re: Gnome Necro!
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I headed for grobb at level 5. its awsome. The froglocks in guk there have woven and nettled armor. You cant take then right away, but there are alot of
ygData.messageBody:
>
>>Where is a good place for a level 5 Gnomish necro to fight at?


I headed for grobb at level 5. its awsome. The froglocks in guk there have
woven and nettled armor. You cant take then right away, but there are alot
of thing there that you can that are good ex. Also trolls are fun to be
with. Also there isnt much fighting for bone chips so its easy to get them.
Not meny pets there so your sence undead works well.

I have saved 85 plat in a very short time and gone up 6 levels in just over
a week. Hope this helps! Good luck.
